name: Wutaishan South Peak
description: Try this 15.1-km loop trail near Xinzhou, Shanxi. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 5 h 31 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Hukou Waterfall
description: Head out on this 0.5-km out-and-back trail near Linfen, Shanxi. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 8 min to complete. This is a popular trail for birding, hiking, and walking, but you can still enjoy some solitude during quieter times of day.

name: Mount Tianya
description: Get to know this 7.2-km point-to-point trail near Xinzhou, Shanxi. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 1 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.
